entities.name: bezoar
entities.description: A bezoar is mentioned as an object clutched in Harry's hand. It is described as something that can act as an antidote to all these potions.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is a person who reaches the table last and inspects the potions of Ernie and Ron. He is described as someone who can be quite particular about things.

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: Ernie is a student whose potion is inspected by Professor Slughorn. His potion is described as something that Slughorn sniffs and then passes on to Ron's cauldron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student whose cauldron is inspected by Professor Slughorn. His potion is described as something that makes Slughorn retch slightly.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who holds out his hand with the bezoar sitting on his palm. He is described as someone who has a nerve and is like his mother.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who looks livid and sweaty-faced. She is described as someone who has soot on her nose and is working on an antidote with fifty-two ingredients including a chunk of her own hair.

relationships.description: Professor Slughorn inspects Ernie's potion and then passes on to Ron's cauldron.
Professor Slughorn inspects Ron's cauldron and makes a grimace.
Harry holds out his hand with the bezoar sitting on his palm.
Professor Slughorn takes the bezoar from Harry and holds it up so that the class can see it.
